title: The Medieval Islamic Civilization - C. 9 (History, Legacy 3)
description:
The Medieval Islamic Civilization - Collection 9 (History, Legacy 3):

Here is another special set of 4 uploads of books about the Islamic civilization in the medieval age. We have 32 titles in this one:

-  Adamec - Historical Dictionary of Islam, 2e (2009)

-  Adanir & Faroqhi - The Ottomans and the Balkans. a Discussion of Historiography (2002)

-  Ahmad - Hundred Great Muslims (1987)

-  Al-Azmeh - The Emergence of Islam in Late Antiquity; Allah and His People (2014)

-  Alfonso - Islamic Culture Through Jewish Eyes; Al-Andalus from the Tenth to Twelfth Century (2008)

-  Anderson & Rossser-Owen (Eds.) - Revisiting Al-Andalus; Perspectives on the Material Culture of Islamic Iberia and Beyond (2007)

-  Basan - The Great Seljuqs; a History (2010)

-  Collins - Caliphs and Kings, Spain, 796-1031 (2012)

-  Crews - For Prophet and Tsar; Islam and Empire in Russia and Central Asia (2006)

-  Donner - Muhammad and the Believers; at the Origins of Islam (2010)

-  Doubleday & Coleman (Eds.) - In the Light of Medieval Spain; Islam, the West, and the Relevance of the Past (2008)

-  Etheredge (Ed.) - Islamic History (Britannica Educational Publishing, 2010)

-  Haroun - Why Islam;  Proofs of Modern Science (2003)

-  Hawting - The First Dynasty of Islam; the Umayyad Caliphate AD 661Ã¢â‚¬â€œ750, 2e (2000)

-  Holland - In the Shadow of the Sword; the Birth of Islam and the Rise of the Global Arab Empire (2012)

-  Hoyland - Arabia and the Arabs; From the Bronze Age to the Coming of Islam (2001)

-  Humphreys - Mu'awiya ibn Abi Sufyan; From Arabia to Empire (2006)

-  Jackson - Fifty Key Figures in Islam (2006)

-  Jaffar - Mughal Empire from Barbar to Aurangzeb (1936)

-  Kossmann - The Arabic Influence on Northern Berber (2013)

-  Laude (Ed.) - Universal Dimensions of Islam (2011)

-  Lewis - Islam in History; Ideas, People, and Events in the Middle East (1993)

-  Mallett (Ed.) - Medieval Muslim Historians and the Franks in the Levant (2014)

-  Meri (Ed.) - Medieval Islamic Civilization; an Encyclopedia (2006)

-  Netton (Ed.) - Golden Roads; Migration, Pilgrimage and Travel in Medieval and Modern Islam (2005)

-  Riddell & Cotterell - Islam in Context; Past, Present, and Future (2003)

-  Robinson - Empire and Elites after the Muslim Conquest; the Transformation of Northern Mesopotamia (2000)

-  Ruthven - Historical Atlas of Islam (2004)

-  Sanjuan -  Till God Inherits the Earth; Islamic Pious Endowments in al-Andalus, 9-15th Centuries (2007)

-  Saunders - A History of Medieval Islam (1965)
The Britannica Guide to the Islamic World; Religion, History, and the Future (2009)

-  Wismar - Study in Tolerance as Practiced by Muhammad and His Successors (1927)
